name: cuba-rest-js
description: JavaScript library for working with CUBA Platform's REST API v2

scripts.start-test-app: cd test-app && ./gradlew setupTomcat && ./gradlew startDb && ./gradlew createDb && ./gradlew restartAndWaitForInitialization
scripts.test:integration: npm run start-test-app && nyc mocha -t 30000 && npm run teardown-test-app
scripts.dist: npm run compile && browserify --standalone cuba dist-node/cuba.js > dist-browser/cuba.js
